mapper.select: SELECT t1.id , t1.email_address , t1.course_id , t1.course_name , t1.lesson_id , t1.lesson_name , t1.achieved_learning_hours , t2.total_learning_hours , (t1.achieved_learning_hours / t2.total_learning_hours) * 100 as task_progress_rate FROM ( SELECT tu.id , tu.email_address , t.course_id , t.course_name , t.lesson_id , t.lesson_name , sum(t.learning_minutes) / 60 as achieved_learning_hours FROM team_user_task_progress tutp LEFT JOIN team_users tu ON tu.email_address = tutp.email_address INNER JOIN tasks t ON t.chapter_id = tutp.chapter_id WHERE tutp.report_date = #{report_date} GROUP BY tu.id , t.course_id , t.course_name , t.lesson_id , t.lesson_name ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.course_id , t.course_name , t.lesson_id , t.lesson_name , sum(t.learning_minutes) / 60 as total_learning_hours FROM tasks t GROUP BY t.course_id , t.course_name , t.lesson_id , t.lesson_name ) t2 ON t2.course_id = t1.course_id AND t2.lesson_id = t1.lesson_id ORDER BY t1.id , t1.course_id , t1.lesson_id LIMIT #{_pagesize} OFFSET #{_skiprows};
